termsOfService.title: Terms of Use
termsOfService.termsContent: These Terms of Use ("Terms") outline the terms and conditions that govern your use of Payment4.com (the "Platform"). If you do not agree with any part of these Terms, please refrain from using the Platform. These Terms cover important aspects of your use of the Platform, including payment processing, transactions, security, and user responsibilities. By using the Platform, you acknowledge that you have reviewed, understood, and accepted these Terms in their entirety. Please note that these Terms may be updated periodically, and it is your responsibility to review them regularly. Your continued use of the Platform after any changes indicates your acceptance of the updated Terms.
termsOfService.contactUsText: If you have any questions about these Terms or any aspect of the Platform, please contact us at support@payment4.com. Thank you for choosing Payment4. We are committed to providing you with a secure and efficient payment gateway experience.

Your use of the Platform constitutes your consent to comply with and be legally bound by these Terms. If you do not agree to these Terms or any part thereof, please refrain from accessing or using the Platform. Your continued use of the Platform following any modifications to these Terms signifies your acceptance of such changes. Please read these Terms carefully and ensure your understanding of their implications before using the Platform.

You further warrant that any registration information you provide is accurate, complete, and current. If you are accessing or using the Platform on behalf of an entity, organization, or company, you represent and warrant that you have the authority to bind such entity to these Terms, and "you" or "your" as used in these Terms will refer to both you and the entity you represent. You acknowledge that your use of the Platform is subject to compliance with all applicable laws, regulations, and ordinances, and you agree to be solely responsible for such compliance. If you do not meet these eligibility requirements or do not agree with any part of these Terms, please refrain from using the Platform.

You are solely responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials, including your username and password. You agree not to share your account information with any third party and to notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account.

termsOfService.accountSecurityRecommendationText: You are advised to choose a strong and unique password, enable multi-factor authentication when available, and regularly update your account information to ensure the security of your account.
termsOfService.privacyPolicyAcknowledgementText: By creating an account on the Platform, you acknowledge that you have read and agree to our Privacy Policy, which outlines how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.
termsOfService.responsibilitiesAndGuidelinesTitleText: When using the Platform, you agree to adhere to the following responsibilities and guidelines:
termsOfService.lawfulUseText: You will use the Platform for lawful purposes only and will not engage in any activity that violates any applicable laws, regulations, or third-party rights.
termsOfService.accurateInformationText: You will provide accurate, complete, and up-to-date information when using the Platform, including during account registration and transaction processing.
termsOfService.prohibitedActivitiesText: You will not use the Platform for any purpose that is harmful, abusive, obscene, threatening, harassing, or defamatory. You will refrain from engaging in fraud, phishing, hacking, or any illegal or unauthorized activity.
termsOfService.securityText: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account credentials, including your username and password. You will promptly notify us of any unauthorized access to or use of your account.
termsOfService.personalUseText: You will use the Platform solely for your own personal, non-commercial use and will not resell, sublicense, or share access to the Platform with third parties.
termsOfService.transactionsText: You will only initiate transactions on the Platform that are lawful and valid. You understand that transactions are irreversible and that you must carefully review and verify transaction details before proceeding.
termsOfService.thirdPartyContentText: You acknowledge that the Platform may contain links to third-party websites or content. You are responsible for reviewing and abiding by the terms and policies of any third-party websites or services you access through the Platform.
termsOfService.complianceText: You will comply with all applicable laws and regulations related to cryptocurrency use, financial transactions, and data protection.

termsOfService.suspensionOrTerminationText: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account and access to the Platform if we suspect any violation of these responsibilities or if your use of the Platform is deemed detrimental to us or other users.
termsOfService.useOfPlatformText: Your use of the Platform is subject to these responsibilities and any additional guidelines or policies we may provide. Payment and Transactions
termsOfService.platformSecurityAndPaymentsText: The Platform provides a secure environment for processing cryptocurrency transactions. By utilizing the Platform's services, you agree to the following terms related to payments and transactions:

Payment4.com shall not be liable for any losses resulting from incorrect or incomplete transaction information provided by you.
termsOfService.irreversibleTransactionText: Once a transaction is sent on the blockchain, it is irreversible and cannot be canceled. You are advised to carefully review all transaction details before confirming a payment.
termsOfService.transactionFeesText: Certain transactions may be subject to fees, which will be clearly indicated before you confirm the transaction. Payment of these fees is your responsibility and is required for the successful processing of the transaction.
termsOfService.cryptocurrencyConversionsText: If applicable, cryptocurrency conversions will be performed at the prevailing exchange rates at the time of the transaction. You acknowledge that exchange rates can fluctuate and may impact the final amount received by you.
termsOfService.cryptocurrencyRisksText: While Payment4.com employs security measures to safeguard transactions, you acknowledge that the use of cryptocurrencies carries inherent risks, including but not limited to network failures and delays, blockchain congestion or failure, and fluctuations in cryptocurrency value. Payment4.com shall not be responsible for any losses incurred due to these risks.
termsOfService.complianceWithLawsText: You agree to comply with all applicable laws and regulations related to cryptocurrency transactions and payments. You are solely responsible for ensuring that your transactions are legal and legitimate.
termsOfService.transactionDisputesResolutionText: In the event of a dispute or discrepancy regarding a transaction, you may contact Payment4.com's customer support. We will make reasonable efforts to address your concerns, but the resolution of disputes is subject to the policies and procedures outlined in these Terms.
